website_summaries.verdict: With trimmable insoles to fit your specific size, these rechargeable battery-operated warmers keep your feet warm all day inside your ski boots and other footwear.
pros: 3 base-level settings plus a heat-blast option
2 heating elements, 1 pair each of Cambrelle covers, strips, and insoles
Comes with a pair of S4 power-plus battery packs
Heating elements stick to toes or heels
Trim insole to fit your shoes
cons: Need to start with roomy boots
Wire connections may fail over time if used in flexible footwear

customer_reviews.title: Strongly endorse these!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of these things. I had a surgery that limits my circulation in my left foot, and my toes are very sensitive to the cold. When I ski (snowboard, actually), this had been a real problem. No longer. These warmers keep me warm all day, and if I crank them all the way up it gets TOO hot. I had tried a million different solutions before this, but none of the other warmers had helped. These WORK, and the installation is pretty easy. You can find many YouTube videos to help you. It takes about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark Pollitt

customer_reviews.title: mixed review
customer_reviews.text: My feet are always freezing when I ski, so I got these as a Christmas present. So, they definitely keep your feet from freezing. I wouldn't say your feet are toasty--but they aren't freezing...so that's a plus. After one season, the wires that connect from your boots to the battery packs are all fraying. It seems like at this price the wires should be sturdy enough to last more than one season. I'm hoping to get through this season without them breaking completely. Hoping there's some sort of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Chef

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST! Treat yo'self.
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO GLAD I FINALLY HAVE THESE! The main thing that ends my day on the mountain is cold feet, every time. These are amazing! Kind of weird to install (cutting the liner is a little nerve wrecking) but man will you feel the difference! Your feet will feel completely normal - they wont be cold but they should not be hot or its up too high. I go between setting 2 and 3 and have felt amazing all season. After a decade of trying other things (boot gloves - which I still love) and working my way up to buying these, I'm thrilled to report they are as awesome as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Fun to install
customer_reviews.text: Forget the written instructions, they make it difficult. Watch this video [...] And be ready to cuss a lot .... if your custom foot bed is stiff, it will take a LARGE slit to get the plug thru.... likewise the boot liner... and be careful, don't pull the plug, PUSH it (if you pull it, it may come apart) Be sure to test the heater before cutting the liner
customer_reviews.author: ER Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: I live in Alaska and I love to downhill ski
customer_reviews.text: I live in Alaska and I love to downhill ski. I have been skiing with toe warmers, but they aren't comfortable or easy to get in the boots. These footwarmers are amazing, my feet do not get cold at -20F and it makes the day much nicer, since my feet aren't cold, the rest of my body can focus on warming itself up! I recommend these if you are in a cold area and love to ski.
customer_reviews.author: DWilson

customer_reviews.title: Hotronics Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hotronic foot bed warmers since their inception. All the battery changes, performance upgrades over the years....only better and better. I originally used them in ski boots, now I am using them in my hunting boots as well. I would have given 5 stars but for the price. I usually can get them on sale (batteries/beds) for my kids or myself at our local ski shop at a significant savings end of season. You get what you pay for when you need them. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: bowhunter

customer_reviews.title: and still wprking great at 6
customer_reviews.text: Foot warmers arrived when I was told would come. Spent several hrs installing them in soles that I already had. Used them today turned them on lo at 6:30 am: and still wprking great at 6:00 pm. Would like to have a remote control, because the batteries are hard to get to under pant legs to operate. But they worked great keeping my toes warm. temerature was not real cold, but without them on my feet would have been cold, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Terry Falldorf

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this product despite the reviews of poor design. Sadly those reviews were accurate. The batteries do not stay secure to ski boots. After several instances of the batteries slipping I finally lost one. Additionally, the cord to connect the heating element to the battery repeatedly came loose and one eventually snapped. The connection for the charger also has flimsy plastic components that broke after only a handful of charges. When these heaters are not falling apart or falling off they work well, but until there’s a design improvement I’m not sure they’re worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for what they are.. but still cheaper than other places. I’ve used them a bit and they work well. Sometimes too well sometimes not enough. Hard to adjust once you’re all strapped in but seems to do the trick ok
customer_reviews.author: Landon Ostler

customer_reviews.title: Installation is fairly easy and illustrated on youtube
customer_reviews.text: If you ski frequently and in all conditions, this is the setup for you. No more cold toes. Installation is fairly easy and illustrated on youtube. I put these on some surefeet inserts. Arch support and heat! The batteries have lasted all day (8 hours) on setting two. I've had to use setting 3 on days below 0F, but otherwise setting 1 or 2 works.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Funny

customer_reviews.title: Steady Heat
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for bicycling in winter. We purchased these instead of battery powered socks after reading many reviews. These are GREAT! The installation was pretty basic. We clipped the battery to the upper edge of the cycling boot and you don't notice they are there. I like how easy they are to adjust. I'm glad I got the S4 for the longer run time and extra heat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: I am so so thrilled with this purchase. Expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so so thrilled with this purchase. Expensive, but worth every penny. I no longer have to go inside to warm my feet while skiing- I can ski the ENTIRE day. Thank you so much for making this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The wire connector breaks too easy! Not a durable design.
customer_reviews.text: The wire connector breaks too easy! Not a durable design. The wire connector breaks very easily. The header stuck on the battery side can't get them out. Not a durable design for outdoor sports which shall be all rugged. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: XW

customer_reviews.title: All around a great product. My batteries are still going strong
customer_reviews.text: A must for skiers. I have had Hotronics S4 in my boots for 2 years and can't believe I skied with out them. I just bought a pair for my niece who is 15. Her feet are always cold due to a medical condition. I believe this will solve her problem. All around a great product. My batteries are still going strong. Easy to install. Went to Youtube for instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Had much more expensive heated socks - these are WAY better!!!
customer_reviews.author: VO

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to where as I work outside even in freezing temperatures. Even at below freezing temperatures my feet stayed warm. They don't last all day if I turn them up to the highest temperature, but my feet stay plenty warm at the medium setting and a couple of pairs of socks. At the medium setting they last all day. Would highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Edward/Kristi Holterman

customer_reviews.title: These are really great boot heaters
customer_reviews.text: These are really great boot heaters. I have been very reluctant to buy any due to issues I have heard about. I have 10 days on these and temps below zero to 26 degrees - they work very well and are easy tp install!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of just how well this would work. I read the reviews and decided to take a chance. I am an avid hunter and run an old wheel loader to plow with. The loader has little heat and I suffer from Raynaud's syndrome. My toes would turn white and burn intensely. With the Hotronic heaters my feet didn't feel warm like a toaster but MY FEET DID NOT GET COLD :)
customer_reviews.author: Pulsfam

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps the toes warm while skiing. Before this ...
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps the toes warm while skiing. Before this, my toes would freeze on cold days. Now, even on the first setting, my toes are toasty. The only drawback is the cable can get warped, so I duck-taped the cable. You can look in youtube how to install these fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I think I have mild Raynaud's disease. I love skiing, but sometimes my fingers and toes just get cold, blue and numb. These warmers really help. I also had a issue and customer service was very responsive and accommodating. Thanks Jodi!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: great warmers
customer_reviews.text: I installed these myself by following instructions on youtube - very easy to do. They warm very well and have lasted well for a ski season.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ginder

customer_reviews.title: Batteries failed
customer_reviews.text: Batteries have failed in less than a year. No response from company
customer_reviews.author: Ray1

customer_reviews.title: I am one with poor circulation in my feet
customer_reviews.text: I am one with poor circulation in my feet. You do not really feel the heat, but they tell you that. All I can say is they do keep me in the outdoors in the cold longer. Some reviews say they are hard to install, but those people must have a hard time reading instructions. I do wish I would have found these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: joseph pehler

customer_reviews.title: broke after using twice
customer_reviews.text: the cords going between battery pack and heater pad is very brittle. used them twice and the cord broke. i am in contact with hotronics to see if they will stand behind their product. they did work very good until failure.
customer_reviews.author: todd hutzler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flat insole not so great if you're an aggressive skier, heater is effective.
customer_reviews.author: RWG

customer_reviews.title: Hotronic - Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Hotronic for $190,,,great deal (I;'ve seen them for $240). I used them in the skiing in Vermont when it was 'minus' degress. They keep my feet warm with the settings of 2 of 4. I've been skiing for 38 years,,,,why did I wait so long to get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: alan b christensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. On '2', not too warm, not cold... @15F. Batteries fit well attached to cardboard in the powder pants bib using the extension. Shoulda bought them five years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep your feet warm and toasty!
customer_reviews.text: Kept my husband's feet warm and toasty while skiing Mammmoth in Jan. 2017!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a gift. Don't think he has used them yet. Sorry.

customer_reviews.text: bought these for my husband for work and he is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They do work well a little uncomfortable but do the job
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I have poor circulation so when we go up to our cabin ...
customer_reviews.text: I have poor circulation so when we go up to our cabin in our side by side which is outfitted with tracks my feet always froze. These make my feet feel like it is just another day for a four wheeler ride. My husband fitted them in my boots with no problems. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality cables.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for less than 2 months and heating cables failed and broke apart by then. I had installed exactly per installation specs.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Chiang

customer_reviews.title: It's been a cold winter in the north country this ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been a cold winter in the north country this year. These have saved may bacon without the discomfort of cramming toe warmers into already tight boots.
customer_reviews.author: D Fox

customer_reviews.title: Superb! Saved my daughter's cold feet from skiing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my daughter frequently complained about cold during ski. It turned out to be a good choice for her. The batteries performed perfectly at 20 Fahrenheit weather in Eastern Washington. My daughter no longer felt cold for her toes. We used it from 10AM to 4PM for totally six hours and it worked perfectly well. I'm very happy for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: must have!
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS -18 AT KILLINGTON - I was toasty and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lai

customer_reviews.title: A worth while investment
customer_reviews.text: These boot heaters work great ! Require very little skill to install. Keep my feet warm all day, Not hot, just right.
customer_reviews.author: vt1200

customer_reviews.title: P{erfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Replaced a 10 yr old Hotronic product that was fail safe.
customer_reviews.author: MP Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Big and heavy battery, wish I had bought the s3. My fault. Work well, easy to install after watching the video on YouTube. I had the sidas pro set(silent auction)which were light and nicer, but one new battery was 160, so I got these
customer_reviews.author: Dopey

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries/hooks problematic
customer_reviews.text: Love the batteries. They keep my feet nice and warm throughout the day while I'm skiing. I don't usually need to set the heaters any higher than "2" so they never run out. The only negative I have about the batteries is that the hooks that are used to attach them to the boots are not very secure. Have almost lost the batteries a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: travel-gal6979

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is cold blooded and these have made ski days a whole new experience!!! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet on the slopes
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and in tact. Looking forward to warm toes on the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: richardw

customer_reviews.title: Take more runs down the slopes
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect total fix on the cold feet however do expect to be able to make a few more runs down the slope than usual as your feet will be warmer than without.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The heater pads put out heat but not enough to feel through either of the soles they provide.

product_meta.title: Hotronic Universal S4 FootWarmer Kit
product_meta.description: Say goodbye to uncomfortable insoles and cold feet with the Hotronic Foot Warmer Insole. These footbeds give the bottoms of your feet that extra warmth that you have so desired for all these years. Having an easy and unnoticeable cable that runs on the outside of your liner to an insole that you put it, these will be your best friend this season. This Package comes with everything you need to get your feet warm this winter, grab a pair and see how much longer you stay out there.
feature_bullets: 2 S4 Power Plus Battery Packs, with four cells and one 1 Recharger (back compatible with e and m series Battery Packs)
2 Heating Elements,1 pair of Cambrelle Covers and Strips, and 1 pair of Hotronic’s One Size Fits All – Heat Ready Insoles.
Keep feet warm inside ski boots or easily transfer to other footwear
Three base level settings for maintaining warmth, and a fourth setting offers an extra blast of heat
The new S series batteries offer more than ever before, including enhanced reliability, longevity, and performance
